name: df-vdwpc
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cvdwp, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wrex(s3, cn, wrex(s4, co(cn, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), wa(wral(s5, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), wss(co(co(cv(s3), caddc, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s5))), cfv(cvdwa, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s4), cv(s5))), cima(ccnv(cv(s2)), csn(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), caddc, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s5)))))))), wceq(cfv(chash, crn(cmpt(s5, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), caddc, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s5))))))), cv(s0)))))))
comment: Define the "contains a polychromatic collection of APs" predicate. See ~ vdwpc for more information. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2014.)
